original_text: And he shall not look to the altars, the work of his hands, neither shall respect that which his fingers have made, either the groves, or the images.
korean_text: 자기 손으로 만든 제단을 바라보지 아니하며 자기 손가락으로 지은 아세라나 태양상을 보지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall not look to the altars
neither shall respect that which his fingers have made
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 손가락이 만든 것도 존중하지 않을 것이다
